4845 - Search - US-China trade war: Could Trump go further with his tariffs?The US and China have been in a trade war as they exchange reciprocal tariffs targeting imports such as cotton, energy, and automobiles. President Trump has ramped up the tariffs against China in the trade policies he deployed in his first term. Former Wall Street Journal Senior Editor Bob Davis sits down with Market Domination Overtime hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton to expand upon his views on US-China trade dialogues, the role Tesla (TSLA) CEO Elon Musk’s involvement in the current US administration, and the ways that China could retaliate further that directly affect American consumers and the US tech industry. Davis is the author of Broken Engagement: Interviews with those who have made — and remade — the U.S.’s policy towards China. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
